name: memory allocation library
short_description:
This is a memory allocation library
allocation is done through the expansion of the size of the heap
the algorithm is used  the first adaptation
Library open source, you can be free to use and modify, but do not for malicious ways
if you find bugs, please inform me

Installation method: make install
uninstall method: make remove
Usage: #include <mem.h>, -lmcm

attention: ALl out of bounds modify data's  behavior will result in the operating  function  uncertain
